title: Only 1 Female Champ in Free Rotation?
body: The last time this happened was 3 weeks ago... Cmon riot, pull up.

replies.body: Only one Champion starting with a B? Come on riot

lol

if only champion free week was determined by sex and not *real* factors...oh wait : ^)
The damn patriarchy is at it again. Check your privileges Rito. I blame it on the rape culture.

first thing.. why does it matter? 

second thing, what does this has to do with gameplay? the category is gameplay while it is not... bruh
